title: How to Make DIY Office Weapons

steps.title: You are going to need.
steps.content: You are going to need. Seven pencils A bunch of rubber bands A plastic spoon A binder clip

steps.title: Attach three of the pencils so that it forms a square with a hole at the top.
steps.content: Attach three of the pencils so that it forms a square with a hole at the top.

steps.title: Attach the last pencil with the binder clip going through it.
steps.content: Attach the last pencil with the binder clip going through it.

steps.title: Attach two more pencils at the rear in a slight triangular shape.
steps.content: Attach two more pencils at the rear in a slight triangular shape. This is a base to keep it from flinging forward when you shoot.

steps.title: Attach the spoon to the final pencil with rubber bands or tape and put it in the clip with a little piece of pencil sticking out.
steps.content: Attach the spoon to the final pencil with rubber bands or tape and put it in the clip with a little piece of pencil sticking out.

steps.title: Attach many rubber bands to the end of the clip to the pencils in front.
steps.content: Attach many rubber bands to the end of the clip to the pencils in front.

steps.title: And there we go.
steps.content: And there we go. A catapult. You can shoot coins, paper, and marbles but also many other things.

steps.title: You will need
steps.content: You will need A party popper A pen

steps.title: Carefully remove the bottom of the party popper and remove all of the insides.
steps.content: Carefully remove the bottom of the party popper and remove all of the insides. This can be done by adding pressure on the sides of the popper.

steps.title: Now unscrew the bottom and the top so that there is only the body of the pen left.
steps.content: Now unscrew the bottom and the top so that there is only the body of the pen left.

steps.title: Thread the string of the party popper through the part which you write from.
steps.content: Thread the string of the party popper through the part which you write from.

steps.title: Re screw the pen tip on the body.
steps.content: Re screw the pen tip on the body.

steps.title: Add your ammunition in the body of the pen and pull the string.
steps.content: Add your ammunition in the body of the pen and pull the string.
